Sentencas: Sc2O3 stabilized zirconia (ScSZ) was processed by combustion synthesis.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline ScSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction was carried for analyzing the phase and crystallinity of the processed powder.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline ScSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The results indicate the effectiveness of the combustion synthesis process to produce nanocrystalline ScSZ from the precursor salts without any intermediate calcination step.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline ScSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: Comparison with the X-ray diffraction pattern of a commercial 8YSZ sample showed that the process is also effective in producing the desired cubic fluorite phase.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline ScSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The powder was compacted and sintered to produce a dense electrolyte pellet.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline ScSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The sintering temperature was found to be considerably lower compared to conventional microcrystalline zirconia ceramics.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline ScSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the ScSZ electrolyte was found to be higher compared to 8YSZ processed under same conditions.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline ScSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The Arrhenius plot of conductivity yielded two activation energies corresponding to low and high temperature regions.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline ScSZ electrolyte for SOFCs

Sentencas: The activation energy of the 10ScSz electrolyte was found to be considerably lower than the 8YSZ sample.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline ScSZ electrolyte for SOFCs
